subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: M.L.S. Commissioner Don Garber modified an earlier decision Tuesday by saying that Red Bulls goalkeeper Jon Conway and Seattle Sounders defender Jeff Parke would be allowed to practice with their M.L.S. teams while serving the final four games of a 10-game suspension for using performance-enhancing drugs. Garber made the ruling after an appeal by the players union.
